backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report stub containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend components, pages, content modules, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps all pages with SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/branding/Portfol: Card component showing a shareable /gallery link with copy‑to‑clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/branding/QRCodeB: Renders a QR code from a matrix inside a styled card for contact scanning.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Simple reusable section header with title and optional subtitle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with logo, quick links, contact info, and social media buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, social icons, and mobile menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper including Header, Footer, and a main content outlet.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaLight: Dialog lightbox for viewing full-size images or videos with metadata.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaStrip: Displays up to four gallery items for a category or a placeholder if none exist.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a service section card with title, description, features list, and a media strip based on the service ID.
frontend/src/content/branding.ts: Defines centralized branding assets including logo path and company name variants.
frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts: Exports a list of gallery media items with metadata for images and videos grouped by category.
frontend/src/content/qrMatrix.ts: Provides a static numeric matrix representing a QR code for a contact page URL.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines the Service interface and a list of service offerings with descriptions and features, plus additional offerings.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains site copy such as company name, mission, vision, and contact information.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Exports social media profile URLs for Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, identity persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-related React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode theming, and utility classes including gold accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with company information, service overview, and styled content using cards and section headers.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with email, location, and phone sections using cards and site copy data.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a filterable media gallery with category tabs, lightbox support, and empty states when no media exists.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, navigation buttons, contact summary, QR block, and a services preview.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows all services using ServiceSection components and lists additional offerings in a styled card section.
frontend/src/pages/VisionMissionPage.tsx: Presents the company’s vision and mission in two styled cards using siteCopy content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature records for the SAQ website.
